professional_summary: Experienced Oracle Database Administrator with expertise in database administration, system development, and maintenance. Proficient in Oracle 10g and 11g databases, DataGuard/Standby configurations, RMAN, and Grid Control. Strong skills in database capacity planning, user management, and application tuning.

key_responsibilities: Monitored database growth and provided capacity planning.
Administered Oracle 10g and 11g databases on multiple platforms.
Executed traditional cold backups using OS commands and logical exports.
Converted single-node instances to RAC with ASM and added instances to existing RAC configurations.
Monitored ETL jobs and resolved long-running database queries.
Administered SQL Server databases for development
Provided assistance to application teams during SQL tuning.
Automated routine DBA tasks such as backups and stats using Grid Control jobs.

technical_skills:
Oracle Database Administration",
            "RMAN",
